programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: A distinctive golf course feature becomes the setting for high drama as the players battle for immunity. One competitor's timely use of a mulligan earns safety, setting up an elimination match which comes down to the last putt.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The remaining competitors take a road trip south on the Grand Strand, where choosing the right opponents could prove lucrative for one player. Accuracy off the tee is tested, and an untimely error threatens to derail one contestant's dream.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: As the field dwindles, players must negotiate the limbo wall to secure immunity. One competitor commits a costly mental mistake which could lead to disaster. A surprise development brings Super Immunity back into the discussion.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The competition heats up and one of the most impressive shots in Big Break history highlights the fight for safety. The endgame for Super Immunity is in sight as the final four participants are determined.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The four remaining players vie for an advantage which will go a long way toward determining who will play in the championship match.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Two competitors remain. Only one will be crowned Champion of Big Break Florida. From the Omni Amelia Island Plantation Resort in Amelia Island, Fla.

programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake is teaching how to use ground forces to maximize your power; learn how a tennis ball, yoga block, kettlebell and exercise band can be used to train for more distance.

programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches how to coordinate the lead and trail side body parts to become a better ball striker.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal share ball striking secrets from Masters Champions and Chevron Championship winners. Learn tips for working the ball used by Jack Nicklaus, Tiger Woods, Dustin Johnson, and Hideki Matsuyama.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to go low in the scoring zone. Learn to stick wedge shots with lessons on solid contact, swing path, trajectory control, and distance control. Martin also shares wedge play advice from Open Champion Shane Lowry.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to hit the driver longer and straighter. Learn tips used by Rory McIlroy, Ernie Els, John Daly and more of the game's best all-around drivers. Martin also reveals how to setup for success on the tee.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal reveal what to learn from the game's greatest Texans.Martin teaches a swing move of solid contact used by Byron Nelson, Ben Hogan,Lee Trevino, and Scottie Scheffler.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal give a road map to hit solid iron shots. Learn how to achieve impact while also improving arm structure and swing path. LPGA winner Gaby Lopez joins Martin & Blair on the range to reveal her favorite iron play drills.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal demonstrate how to become a ball flight commander. Learn how to hit powerful draws like Rory McIlroy, hit controlled fades like Collin Morikawa, and hit the low stinger like Tiger Woods.
